Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Teaching Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust. A large specialist cancer hospital serving the North Trent area. Large self-contained radiotherapy/oncology with 82 beds and a large outpatient department. No accident and emergency facilities. Patients self-help group and bereavement counselling groups run within the hospital. Consultants also run clinics at other hospitals.

DisabledAccess.entry: Telephones, Automatic entrance doors, Lifts, Car parking
